name: Date
description: String with the date when the message was sent. Includes timezone.

name: From_bot
description: True if the author is identified as a bot.

name: From_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: From_gender
description: Author gender.

name: From_gender_acc
description: Accuracy to assess author gender.

name: From_id
description: Author Id from SortingHat.

name: From_name
description: Author name.

name: From_org_name
description: Author organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: From_user_name
description: Author's username from SortingHat profile.

name: From_uuid
description: Author UUID from SortingHat.

name: Message-ID
description: String with the unique message header Message-ID.

name: Subject
description: Subject of the message.

name: Subject_analyzed
description: Subject of the message.

name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: author_gender
description: Author gender.

name: author_gender_acc
description: Accuracy to assess author gender.

name: author_id
description: Author Id from SortingHat.

name: author_name
description: Author name.

name: author_org_name
description: Author organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_user_name
description: Author's username from SortingHat profile.

name: author_uuid
description: Author UUID from SortingHat.

name: body_extract
description: Extract of the body from the email, depending on the size of the body it could have the entire message.

name: body
description: Body of the email.

name: email_date
description: Date when the message was sent.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Commit date (when the original author made the commit).

name: is_pipermail_message
description: Value of 1 if the mailing list backend is pipermail.

name: kip
description: Id of the KIP item.

name: kip_binding
description: Value of 1 when the vote is binding, value of 0 when it is not.

name: kip_discuss_inactive_days
description: Number of days since last discussion message.

name: kip_discuss_time_days
description: Number of days between first and last discussion message.

name: kip_final_status
description: String with the final status of the KIP.

name: kip_is_discuss
description: Value of 1 when the message is part of a discussion, value of 0 when it is not.

name: kip_is_first_discuss
description: Value of 1 when the message is the first message of a discussion thread, value of 0 when it is not.

name: kip_is_first_vote
description: Value of 1 when the message is the first message of a voting thread, value of 0 when it is not.

name: kip_is_last_discuss
description: Value of 1 when the message is the last message of a discussion thread, value of 0 when it is not.

name: kip_is_last_vote
description: Value of 1 when the message is the last message of a voting thread, value of 0 when it is not.

name: kip_is_vote
description: Value of 1 when the message is a vote, value of 0 when it is not.

name: kip_result
description: Value of 1 when the KIP was accepted, value of -1 when discarded and empty otherwise.

name: kip_start_end
description: String with any of the following values: discuss_start, discuss_end, voting_start, voting_end.

name: kip_status
description: String with any of the following values: adopted, discussion, voting, inactive, discarded.

name: kip_type
description: String with any of the following values: discuss, vote.

name: kip_vote
description: Number with the vote: 1, 0, -1.

name: kip_voting_inactive_days
description: Number of days since last message with a vote.

name: kip_voting_time_days
description: Number of days between first and last voting message.

name: list
description: String with the uri of the mailing list.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the repository was retrieved from.

name: project
description: Project name.

name: project_1
description: Project name (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy)

name: root
description: True when the message is sent by a root account.

name: size
description: Size of the body of the message.

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: tz
description: Number representation of the timezone.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.
